1 /**
  2  * Created by romans on 9/15/15.
  3  */
  4 /**
  5  * Facade function that implements Kaazing WebSocket communications via JMS server
  6  * @param logInformation function that is used for logging events in a format of function(severity, message).
  7  * @returns {{JMSClient object that implements communication functions}}
  8  * @constructor
  9  */
 10 var jmsClientFunction=function(logInformation){
 11     var queueName="client" + Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000000);
 12     var routingKey="broadcastkey";
 13     function getRandomInt(min, max) {
 14         return Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min)) + min;
 15     }
 16     var messageIdCounter = getRandomInt(1, 100000);
 17 
 18     var appId = (function () {
 19         var fmt = 'xxxxxxxx-xxxx-4xxx-yxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx';
 20         var ret=fmt.replace(/[xy]/g, function (c) {
 21             var r = Math.random() * 16 | 0, v = c === 'x' ? r : (r & 0x3 | 0x8);
 22             return v.toString(16);
 23         });
 24         return ret;
 25     })();
 26 
 27 
 28     var initialized=false;
 29      /**
 30      * Provides communication services with JMS server. Created within jmsClientFunction constructor.
 31      * @class
 32      * @name JMSClient
 33      */
 34 
 35     var JMSClient = {connected:false};
 36 
 37     var messageReceivedFunc=null;
 38 	var connectionEstablishedFunc=null;
 39 
 40     var topicPub=null;
 41     var topicSub=null;
 42     var noLocalFlag=false;
 43     var user=null;
 44     var errorFunction;
 45 
 46     var handleException = function (e) {
 47         logInformation("ERROR","Error! " + e);
 48 		if (typeof (errorFunction)!="undefined" && errorFunction!=null)
 49         	errorFunction(e);
 50     }
 51     var connection=null;
 52     var session=null;
 53     var producer=null;
 54     var consumer=null;
 55 
 56     var prepareSend = function () {
 57         var dest = session.createTopic(topicPub);
 58         producer = session.createProducer(dest);
 59         logInformation("INFO","Producer is ready! AppID=" + appId);
 60     }
 61 
 62     var prepareReceive = function (rcvFunction) {
 63         var dest = session.createTopic(topicSub);
 64         if (noLocalFlag)
 65             consumer = session.createConsumer(dest, "appId<>'" + appId + "'");
 66         else
 67             consumer = session.createConsumer(dest);
 68         consumer.setMessageListener(function (message) {
 69             var body=message.getText();
 70             logInformation("DEBUG","Received from the wire "+body);
 71             try{
 72                 body=JSON.parse(body);
 73             }
 74             catch(e){
 75                 logInformation("WARN","Received object is not JSON");
 76             }
 77             rcvFunction(body);
 78         });
 79         logInformation("INFO","Consumer is ready!");
 80     }
 81 
 82     /**
 83      * Connects to Kaazing WebSocket JMS Gateway
 84      * @param url Connection URL
 85      * @param username User name to be used to establish connection
 86      * @param password User password to be used to establish connection
 87      * @param topicP Name of the publishing endpoint - JMS topic used for publishing.
 88      * @param topicS Name of the subscription endpoint - AMQP topic used for subscription
 89      * @param noLocal Flag indicating whether the client wants to receive its own messages (true) or not (false). That flag should be used when publishing and subscription endpoints are the same.
 90      * @param messageDestinationFuncHandle Function that will be used to process received messages from subscription endpoint in a format: function(messageBody)
 91      * @param errorFuncHandle function that is used for error handling in a format of function(error)
 92      * @param connectFunctionHandle function this is called when connection is established in a format: function()
 93      */
 94     JMSClient.connect=function(url,username, password, topicP, topicS, noLocal, messageDestinationFuncHandle, errorFuncHandle, connectFunctionHandle){
 95         topicPub=topicP;
 96         topicSub=topicS;
 97         user=username;
 98         errorFunction=errorFuncHandle;
 99         messageReceivedFunc=messageDestinationFuncHandle;
100 		connectionEstablishedFunc=connectFunctionHandle;
101 
102         noLocalFlag=noLocal;
103         logInformation("INFO","CONNECTING TO: " + url);
104 
105         var jmsConnectionFactory = new JmsConnectionFactory(url);
106 
107         try {
108             var connectionFuture = jmsConnectionFactory.createConnection(username, password, function () {
109                     if (!connectionFuture.exception) {
110                         try {
111                             connection = connectionFuture.getValue();
112                             connection.setExceptionListener(handleException);
113 
114                             logInformation("INFO","CONNECTED");
115 
116                             session = connection.createSession(false, Session.AUTO_ACKNOWLEDGE);
117 
118                             connection.start(function () {
119                                 logInformation("INFO","JMS session created");
120                                 prepareSend();
121                                 prepareReceive(messageReceivedFunc);
122                                 JMSClient.connected=true;
123 								if (typeof(connectionEstablishedFunc) != "undefined" && connectionEstablishedFunc!=null){
124 									connectionEstablishedFunc();
125 								}
126                             });
127                         }
128                         catch (e) {
129                             handleException(e);
130                         }
131                     }
132                     else {
133                         handleException(connectionFuture.exception);
134                     }
135                 });
136         }
137         catch (e) {
138             handleException(e);
139         }
140     }
141 
142     /**
143      * Sends messages to a publishing endpoint.
144      * @param msg Message to be sent. As messages are sent in a text format msg will be converted to JSON if it is not a string.
145      */
146     JMSClient.sendMessage=function(msg){
147         if (typeof msg ==="object"){
148             msg=JSON.stringify(msg);
149         }
150 
151         var textMsg = session.createTextMessage(msg);
152         if (noLocalFlag)
153             textMsg.setStringProperty("appId", appId);
154         try {
155             var future = producer.send(textMsg, function () {
156                 if (future.exception) {
157                     handleException(future.exception);
158                 }
159             });
160         } catch (e) {
161             handleException(e);
162         }
163         logInformation("sent","Send command " + msg, "sent");
164     }
165 
166     /**
167      * Disconnects from Kaazing WebSocket JMS Gateway
168      */
169     JMSClient.disconnect=function(){
170         producer.close(function(){
171             consumer.close(function(){
172                 session.close(function(){
173                     connection.close(function(){
174 
175                     });
176                 });
177             });
178         });
179 
180     }
181 
182     return JMSClient;
183 };
184
